description: This Dart file defines a service class `DBService` responsible for managing CRUD operations on a habits database using SQLite via the `sqflite` package. It includes initialization of the database, creation of the habits table, and an insertion method for habits.

classes.name: DBService
classes.description: A singleton class providing database initialization and CRUD operations for habit data.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the database, creating the habits table if it does not already exist.

methods.name: insertHabit
methods.description: Inserts a Habit object into the habits table, replacing existing entries with the same id.
